name: CatEntityHelper
description: The CatEntityHelper class provides specialized access to cat entities in Minecraft, offering methods to monitor and interact with cat-specific behaviors.
overview:
The `CatEntityHelper` class provides specialized access to cat entities in Minecraft, offering methods to monitor and interact with cat-specific behaviors such as sleeping states, collar colors, and breed variants. This class extends `TameableEntityHelper` and inherits all functionality for tameable animals including taming status, sitting behavior, and ownership tracking.

This helper is particularly useful for creating scripts that manage cat companions, monitor cat behavior patterns, track different cat variants for breeding purposes, or coordinate with multiple cats in the world.

methods.name: isSleeping
methods.description: Checks if the cat is sleeping. Returns true when cats are sleeping on beds, chests, or other furniture. They will wake up when disturbed or when night ends.

methods.name: getCollarColor
methods.description: Returns a DyeColorHelper with color information. Collar colors are only visible on tamed cats.

methods.name: getVariant
methods.description: Returns one of 11 possible cat variants, which affects appearance and breeding patterns.
